page.title: 10MY DAY - REBECCA.
page.content: I get up at 07:45 each day and get washed and dressed.At 08:00 I start to watch television for half an hour then at 08:30 I go to call for Emma on the way to school. Emma and I arrive at school at about 08:45 where we meet our other friends. At 09:00 a whistle is blown which tells us that it is time for school to begin. Our school day begins with {assembly} which takes place in the dining hall. We usually have a story, sing a hymn and say a prayer. We return to our own classroom and have lessons in Mathematics and English until mid-day. We have a short break between 10:30 and 10:45. All pupils can stay at school for lunch if they wish. Afternoon lessons begin at 13:05 and continue until 15:45.
